com.devtence.will.dev.commons.caches

Class AuthorizationCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devtence.will.dev.commons.caches.AuthorizationCache

  • public class AuthorizationCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton Cache class that stores the users permissions access and roles. It's used by the UserAuthenticator to validate the permissions. if the USE_CACHE flag is set to TRUE in the Constants class, Memcached will be used, otherwise goes directly to the Google Cloud Datastore.
    Since:
    2016-03-10
    Author:
    plessmann
    See Also:
    UserAuthenticator, CacheAuthWrapper
